home_desc_1: Front end software developement in India,
home_desc_2: with a particular passion for design,
about_desc: Development and design can feed and learn one from each other in any project. Hybrid professionals that understand and can communicate with both ends have the key to a better work flow in every environment.
about_summary: I believe more can be achieved when both ends meet, and I have a passion for being right where they do so.

work.projectDesc: Production deployed application for Chaayos in iOS and Android. Provides the customer with a queue-less experience to order at cafe. Maintainance and enhancements for the app.

Built from the ground up. Created for Cafe to enhance the ordering experience of the customer. Provides a clear view to the customer on what is going on while ordering. Connected with the organization's Point of Sale System through MQTT network.
Built from scratch. Created for internal Chaayos employees to keep track of day to day analytics, supply chain & complete data of sales.
